casebody.data:
RAILROAD FRICTION PRODUCTS CORPORATION
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE 278A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 4, 2019

Kay Miller Hobart, Attorney at Law, For Railroad Friction Products Corporation.

Perry J. Pelaez, Assistant Attorney General, For NC Department of Revenue.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of September 2019 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of September 2019."

*351Petitioner shall have up to and including the 1st day of October 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
